text: Women of Glamour is a 1937 American comedy film directed by Gordon Wiles and starring Virginia Bruce, Melvyn Douglas and Reginald Denny.Goble p.1022 It is a remake of the 1930 film Ladies of Leisure, which was itself based on the 1926 silent film Ladies of Leisure. The film's sets were designed by the art director Stephen Goosson. ==Main cast== * Virginia Bruce as Gloria Hudson * Melvyn Douglas as Richard 'Dick' Stark * Reginald Denny as Fritz 'Frederick' Eagan * Pert Kelton as Nan LaRoque * Leona Maricle as Carol Coulter * Thurston Hall as Mr. Stark * Mary Forbes as Mrs. Stark * Maurice Cass as Caldwell * Clarissa Selwynne as Woman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan.
